info.description: This documentation explains how this rest api works and how to use it. What is a Rest Api ? A restful api is an application program interface (API) that uses HTTP requests to GET, PUT, PATCH, POST and DELETE data. Rest or Representational State Transfer is an architectural style for HTTP communication between computer systems on the web aiming to make it simpler and clearer. How it s works ? There is some endpoints listed below, like '/labels', '/labels/{id}' etc .. , You could request it with HTTP methods, for exemple GET /labels. You must provide a bearer token in the `Authorization` header of your request to get the permission to interact with the API. example: `{'Authorization': Bearer {token}}` To get this token, you must request the /authenticate endpoint of the API, cf the documentation below. How to use it ? You can test the endpoints by clicking on the `Try out` button, filling the request body and clicking execute. You can fill the authorization key in the header, by clicking on the `Authorize` button above the endpoint list. You could use differents servers, either the virtual server (mocked data) or undeplus api.
info.title: 12plus Documentation

post.description: Fetch a token (The Token expired after 24 hours)

get.description:
By passing in the appropriate params, you can search for
available labels in the system

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the uniq id of the label

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: the tracking number of the package

parameters.name: destination_country
parameters.description: The destination country of the package

parameters.name: declared_weight
parameters.description: The declared price of the package

patch.description: You can not create any labels

total_deposit.description: This value is only set on Reconciliation Invoice. It s the sum of the 4 deposit invoices

net_to_pay.description: The amount to pay with tax included

price_ht.description: The amount to pay without tax

price_ttc.description: The amount to pay with tax included (same as net_to_pay)

total_real.description: This field is only fill in Reconciliation Invoice, there is the real amount to pay, then in this kind of invoice, the net_to_pay is equal to (total_real - total_deposit)

type.description:
There is two kind of invoices : 

 1. Deposit Invoice is generated each weeks, it's based on the declaration weight. 

 2. Reconciliation Invoice is generated once by month, it recalculate the difference between the declaration and the real weight (verified by the carriers). In this invoice we add all carrier taxes like oil, insurance, volumetric weight etc ...

verified.description: The Invoice is available or not

declared_weight.description: weight of the package at the declaration (grams)

price.description: price based on the declared weight

label_url.description: the url of the pdf label on shippingbo

tracking_url.description: the url of the pdf label on shippingbo

measured_weight.description: weight of the package after Reconciliation (grams)

measured_assurance_value.description: insurance of the package after Reconciliation (grams)

price_reconciled.description: The price of the package after Reconciliation

reference.description: The tracking number of the package

label_id_sb.description: Id of the label on Shippingbo

carrier_service_name.example: so colissimo domicile avec signature - international
